title: What are some applications of calculus in music? - Quora

response.answer_text: Fourier transforms and the harmonic series are fundamental to frequency decomposition and spectral analysis of waveforms. Normal mode theory has extensive application to acoustics, instrument making, concert hall design, recording and even instrument placement in orchestras and ensembles. Electronic amplification and sound distortion pedals are all electronic engineering which has its roots in calculus.
